facelet-taglib.description: D3 UI Compentents implemented by Joseph Hendrix. D3 is written by Mike Bostock.

tag.description: JSF implementation of Masayuki Tanaka's C3 Javascript library, which is a D3-based reusable chart library.

attribute.description: The Java object holding the chart data and data configuration.
attribute.name: chartModel

attribute.description: The value of the id attribute of the div element that contains the chart. This is necessary because it defines what the chart is bound to.
attribute.name: id

attribute.description:
The type of chart to render. Available values are:
  • line
  • spline
  • step
  • area
  • area-spline
  • area-step
  • bar
  • scatter
  • pie
  • donut
  • gauge
Defaults to line.
attribute.name: type

attribute.description: Whether to show the grid along the x axis. Defaults to false.
attribute.name: gridX

attribute.description: Whether to show the grid along the y axis. Defaults to false.
attribute.name: gridY

attribute.description: Whether to show the legend. Defaults to true.
attribute.name: showLegend

attribute.description:
Where to show the legend. Possible values include:
  • bottom
  • right
  • inset
Defaults to bottom.
attribute.name: legendPosition

attribute.description: The title of the chart.
attribute.name: title

attribute.description: The value of the class attribute of the div element that contains the chart.
attribute.name: styleClass

attribute.description: The value of the style attribute of the div element that contains the chart.
attribute.name: style

tag.description: Implementation of a D3 word cloud generator by Jason Davies.

attribute.description: The value of the id attribute of the div element that contains the cloud. This is necessary because it defines what the cloud is bound to.
attribute.name: id

attribute.description: Map of the words (or rather, Strings, as they can have spaces) to the font size of that word. Typcially the size will be the number of occurences, but that is not a requirement.
attribute.name: words

attribute.description: Width of the entire cloud.
attribute.name: width

attribute.description: Height of the entire cloud.
attribute.name: height

attribute.description: The numerical padding for each word / String.
attribute.name: padding

attribute.description: The font face for each word.
attribute.name: font

attribute.description: The number that the dataset will be scaled to, from 0 to this number. See also forceStretch.
attribute.name: scaleTo

attribute.description: If set to true and scaleTo is defined, then if the largest value is less than scaleTo, the dataset will be scaled. Otherwise, if scaling will only occur if the largest value is larger than scaleTo. Default is false.
attribute.name: forceStretch

attribute.description: The value of the class attribute of the div element that contains the cloud.
attribute.name: styleClass

attribute.description: The value of the style attribute of the div element that contains the cloud.
attribute.name: style
